contentList.content: Descendants of celestials of the Upper Planes, aasimars are a rare species often regarded as messianic figures throughout Faerûn. Faced with high expectations from society and compulsions to act or feel certain ways due to their celestial heritage, aasimar often have little control over their own lives. However, those who find their calling- whether through divine purpose or self-discovery- are capable of staggering feats, wielding the powers of the angels themselves.

Descended from crusading angels, Scourge aasimars inherit a burning hatred for the forces of evil and are driven to destroy it wherever it is found. They may tap into their angelic bloodline to burn their foes in holy fire.
Descended from guardian angels, Protector aasimars highly value mortal life and feel obligated to safeguard those around them. They may tap into their angelic bloodline to shield and heal others.

Descended from fallen angels, or having fallen themselves, Fallen aasimars have irreconcilably damaged the connection to their bloodline, and experience conficting impulses to destroy good as much as protect it. Their divine abilities are twisted into something altogether darker.
You can see in ordinary darkness up to a range of [1].
You gain resistance against Radiant damage.
You gain resistance against Necrotic damage.
Revert back from your celestial form.
Once per turn, you may call upon your celestial power to deal extra damage on a succesful attack.
You may use this ability once per turn. The amount of times you can use this ability equals your Proficiency Bonus. You regain your charges on a Long Rest.
You may bless yourself or a target to take reduced damage equal to your Proficiency Bonus the next time they are hurt.
You are blessed by a Vigil to take reduced damage equal to their Proficiency Bonus the next time you are hurt.

Your need to protect others manifests itself as divine power. You gain flight, and at the end of each turn, you and allies within 10 meters of you that you can see restore health equal to your Proficiency Bonus. Once per turn, deal extra Radiant damage equal to your Proficiency Bonus to one target when you deal damage with an attack or spell.
At the end of each turn, you and allies within 10 meters of you that you can see restore health equal to your Proficiency Bonus.
You may infuse yourself or a target with divine ire, gaining your Proficiency Bonus as Radiant damage on their next attack or spell.
You are infused with divine ire by a Scourge of the Light, gaining their Proficiency Bonus as Radiant damage on your next attack or spell.

Your righteous fury boils over. You gain flight, shed bright light in a 10-foot radius, and at the end of your turn, you and each enemy creature within 10 meters of you take radiant damage equal to your Proficiency Bonus. Once per turn, deal extra Radiant damage equal to your Proficiency Bonus to one target when you deal damage to it with an attack or a spell.
At the end of your turn, you and each enemy creature within 10 meters of you take radiant damage equal to your Proficiency Bonus. You also shed bright light in a 10 meter radius.

You may ward yourself or an ally with your inner darkness, forcing the next enemy who attacks them in melee to make a Charisma save, or become Frightened for a duration equal to half your Proficiency Bonus, rounded down.

You are warded by a Fallen Aasimar's inner darkness, forcing the next enemy who attacks you in melee to make a Charisma save, or become Frightened for a duration equal to half their Proficiency Bonus, rounded down.

Unleash the darkness inside. You gain flight, and at the end of each turn, other creatures within 10 meters of you that can see you must each succeed on a Charisma saving throw (DC8+Proficiency+Spellcasting Modifier) or become frightened of you until the end of your next turn. Once per turn, deal extra Necrotic damage equal to your Proficiency Bonus to one target when you deal damage to it with an attack or a spell.
At the end of each turn, other creatures within 10 meters of you that can see you must each succeed on a Charisma saving throw or become frightened of you until the end of your next turn.
A stronger connection to your ancestral ties has allowed you to manifest your wings at will.
You have transformed into a manifestation of your celestial ancestry.
Once per turn, you may call upon your celestial power to deal extra Radiant damage equal to your Proficiency Bonus on a successful attack.
Once per turn, you may call upon your celestial power to deal extra Necrotic damage equal to your Proficiency Bonus on a successful attack.
